Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $120. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $110. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll be able to take advantage of it. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
